JG Wentworth is looking for a Principal Backend Engineer to join our dynamic and growing engineering team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining our APIs, services, websites, and internal tools. You will also work with other backend and frontend engineers in the team to integrate solutions into our product flows.The ideal candidate will have a sense of ownership of the features they build, a good understanding of product development, and a focus on solving engineering problems. You should have proven experience in building backend solutions from conception to production.Responsibilities:Design and build new features for JGW's Core BusinessBuild new APIs for our lending and banking platform and iterate on existing APIsBuild new tools for our operations teams and iterate on existing toolsIntegrate third-party APIs for improving our security and payments infrastructureRequirementsStrong experience in building backend systems using technologies such as Python, Node.js, Golang, Java, etcExperience in designing and implementing REST APIs and microservices architectureGood understanding of relational database design and managementFamiliarity with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, GCP, or AzureKnowledge of security and data protection, with experience in implementing secure authentication and authorizationAbility to write clean, well-documented, and maintainable codeExperience with Agile software development methodologiesGood communication and collaboration skillsNice to have (but not mandatory):Familiarity with Machine Learning modelingDevOps practices and experience with CI/CD pipelines
